objects.text: Premium linen-blend fabric • Professional tailoring • Versatile matching set • Sustainable material

product_details.name: Elegant Linen Power Suit Set - Modern Professional Luxury
product_details.description:
• Premium quality linen-blend fabric for breathable comfort
• Sophisticated beige/off-white color perfect for any season
• Oversized blazer with structured shoulders and single-button closure
• High-waisted wide-leg pants for a contemporary silhouette
• Professional tailoring with modern design elements
• Versatile matching set suitable for office and formal occasions
• Spacious side pockets in both blazer and pants
• Lightweight material ideal for year-round wear
• Available in sizes XS-XL
• Easy-care fabric with minimal wrinkle retention
• Sustainable and eco-friendly material choice
• Perfect for business meetings, special events, or luxury casual wear

banner_details:
This banner presents an upscale fashion advertisement centered around a minimalist and modern aesthetic. The background features a soft beige gradient enhanced with evenly spaced horizontal lines, providing a structured feel. Two subtle concentric circles highlight the center, where the main product image, a professionally dressed model, is placed. 

The banner includes a prominent main headline (`heading`) using a sophisticated serif font, supported by a secondary subheading (`subheading`) in a clean, modern typeface. Beneath the model, there’s concise feature-focused supporting text (`description`) summarizing the product appeal. 

A bold price tag (`price`) leads into a clear call-to-action button (`cta`) paired with a solid color rectangle as its background (`cta_button_bg`).

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #f3efe9 → #e5e0d5  
- Accent Gradient (circles): #d4c8b8 → #bdb2a1  
- Text Color: #5d5347, #776a5c  
- CTA Button: #9a8e7b  
- CTA Text: #FFFFFF  
- Line Dividers: #c5bcad  
- Decorative dots: #9a8e7b
product_color: The product image features a neutral-toned outfit dominated by soft beige with subtle oatmeal and sand undertones, creating an elegant and minimalist aesthetic. The light beige suit (#D6CEC3) blends seamlessly with the warm taupe inner shirt (#B9A996), delivering cohesive sophistication. These tones are complemented by the cream handbag (#EFE8DD), enhancing the monochromatic palette while adding subtle variation. The black strappy heels (#1C1C1C) punctuate the look with contrast, providing a stylish anchor to the ensemble. An advertisement banner can use a palette of Beige (#D6CEC3), Taupe (#B9A996), Cream (#EFE8DD), Soft Gold (#CBBBA0), and Black (#1C1C1C) to reflect understated luxury and modern chic.
